class.name: CATMathFoundationX
class.abstract: Class representing a predefined scalar function of one variable.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathFoundationX.

method.name: EvalFirstDeriv
method.abstract: Evaluates the first derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFoundationX.

method.name: EvalSecondDeriv
method.abstract: Evaluates the second derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFoundationX.

class.name: CATMathFoundationXY
class.abstract: Class representing a pre-defined scalar function of two variables.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathFoundationXY.

method.name: EvalFirstDerivX
method.abstract: Evaluates the first partial derivative with respect to the first variable of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFoundationXY.

method.name: EvalFirstDerivY
method.abstract: Evaluates the first partial derivative with respect to the second variable of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFoundationXY.

method.name: EvalSecondDerivX2
method.abstract: Evaluates the second partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFoundationXY .

method.name: EvalSecondDerivXY
method.abstract: Evaluates the second partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFoundationXY .

method.name: EvalSecondDerivY2
method.abstract: Evaluates the second partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY .

class.name: CATMathFunctionGeneral
class.abstract: Class representing a scalar function of one or more variables.

method.name: IsA
method.abstract: Returns the class name of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionGeneral.

method.name: IsAKindOf
method.abstract: Tests if <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionGeneral derives from a class (given by its name).

method.name: IsOption
method.abstract: Tests if an evaluator is available for <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionGeneral.

class.name: CATMathFunctionX
class.abstract: Class representing a scalar function of one variable.

method.name: DeepDuplicate
method.abstract: Duplicates <tt>this</tt> as well as the pointers to the CATMathFunctionX referred to by <tt>this</tt>.

method.name: Duplicate
method.abstract: Duplicates <tt>this</tt>.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionX.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Simultaneously evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionX and its derivatives.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Simultaneously evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionX and its derivatives at regularly spaced values.

method.name: EvalFirstDeriv
method.abstract: Evaluates the first derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionX.

method.name: EvalSecondDeriv
method.abstract: Evaluates the second derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionX.

method.name: EvalThirdDeriv
method.abstract: Evaluates the third derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionX.

method.name: IsAKindOf
method.abstract: Tests if <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionX derives from a class (given by its name).

method.name: IsATypeOf
method.abstract: Tests if <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionX derives from a class (given by a numerical value).

class.name: CATMathFunctionXY
class.abstract: Class representing a scalar function of two variables.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY for values defined by intervals.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Simultaneously evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY or/and its partial derivatives.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Simultaneously evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY or/and its partial derivatives on a regular grid of points.

method.name: EvalAllThirdDerivs
method.abstract: Evaluates simultaneously all third partial derivatives of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY .

method.name: EvalFirstDerivX
method.abstract: Evaluates the first partial derivative with respect to the first variable of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY .

method.name: EvalFirstDerivX
method.abstract: Evaluates the first partial derivative with respect to the first variable for values defined by intervals.

method.name: EvalFirstDerivY
method.abstract: Evaluates the first partial derivative with respect to the second variable of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY .

method.name: EvalFirstDerivY
method.abstract: Evaluates the first partial derivative with respect to the second variable for values defined by intervals.

method.name: EvalSecondDerivX2
method.abstract: Evaluates the second partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY .

method.name: EvalSecondDerivX2
method.abstract: Evaluates the second partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY.

method.name: EvalSecondDerivXY
method.abstract: Evaluates the second partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY .

method.name: EvalSecondDerivXY
method.abstract: Evaluates the second partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY.

method.name: EvalSecondDerivY2
method.abstract: Evaluates the second partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY .

method.name: EvalSecondDerivY2
method.abstract: Evaluates the second partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY .

method.name: EvalThirdDerivX2Y
method.abstract: Evaluates the third partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY .

method.name: EvalThirdDerivX3
method.abstract: Evaluates the third partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY .

method.name: EvalThirdDerivXY2
method.abstract: Evaluates the third partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY .

method.name: EvalThirdDerivY3
method.abstract: Evaluates the third partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY .

method.name: EvalUpToThirdDeriv
method.abstract: Evaluates simultaneously the value, and all the first, second and third partial derivatives of <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY .

method.name: IsAKindOf
method.abstract: Tests if <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY derives from a class (given by its name).

method.name: IsATypeOf
method.abstract: Tests if <tt>this</tt> CATMathFunctionXY derives from a class (given by a numerical value).

class.name: CATMathInterval
class.abstract: Class representing a closed bounded interval of R.

constructor.name: CATMathInterval
constructor.abstract: Constructs a CATMathInterval with <tt> Low = High = 0</tt>.

method.name: Center
method.abstract: Returns the center of <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval.

method.name: ClosestPeriodicEndpoint
method.abstract: Retrieves the closest external point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval among those obtained by all the successive translations of length + or -<tt>iPeriod</tt>.

method.name: DistanceTo
method.abstract: Return the distance between <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval and a point.

method.name: GetMax
method.abstract: Returns the high limitation of <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval.

method.name: GetMin
method.abstract: Returns the low limitation of <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval.

method.name: InPeriodicTrim
method.abstract: Tests whether a point belongs to <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval after a given number of translation of length + or -<tt>iPeriod+iTolerance</tt>.

method.name: IsEmpty
method.abstract: Tests if <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval is empty.

method.name: IsIncludedIn
method.abstract: Tests if <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval is included into an other one.

method.name: IsIncludedIn
method.abstract: Tests if <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval is included into an other one at a given absolute tolerance.

method.name: Norm
method.abstract: Returns the norm of <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval.

method.name: PeriodicResidue
method.abstract: Translates a point to locate it at <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval point such that the distance between these two points is a multiple of <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval width.

method.name: SetMax
method.abstract: Modifies the high limitation of <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval.

method.name: SetMin
method.abstract: Modifies the low limitation of <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval.

method.name: Sign
method.abstract: Tests the relative position of <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval with regards to <tt>0</tt>.

method.name: Width
method.abstract: Returns the width of <tt>this</tt> CATMathInterval.

method.name: operator &&
method.abstract: Returns the interval resulting of the intersection of two CATMathIntervals.

method.name: operator *
method.abstract: Defines the multiplication of a CATMathInterval with a scalar.

method.name: operator *
method.abstract: Defines the multiplication of a scalar with a CATMathInterval.

method.name: operator *=
method.abstract: Defines the *= operator of a CATMathInterval with a scalar.

method.name: operator +
method.abstract: Defines the scalar addition with a CATMathInterval.

method.name: operator +
method.abstract: Defines the addition of a CATMathInterval with a scalar.

method.name: operator +
method.abstract: Unary plus operator.

method.name: operator +=
method.abstract: Defines the += operator of a CATMathInterval with a scalar.

method.name: operator +=
method.abstract: Addition assignment operator.

method.name: operator -
method.abstract: Defines the opposite of a CATMathInterval.

method.name: operator -
method.abstract: Defines the scalar substraction with a CATMathInterval.

method.name: operator -
method.abstract: Defines the scalar substraction with a CATMathInterval.

method.name: operator -
method.abstract: Subtraction operator.

method.name: operator -=
method.abstract: Defines the -= operator of a CATMathInterval with a scalar.

method.name: operator -=
method.abstract: Subtraction assignment operator.

method.name: operator /
method.abstract: Defines the division of a CATMathInterval by a scalar.

method.name: operator /
method.abstract: Defines the dividion of a CATMathInterval by another one.

method.name: operator ||
method.abstract: Returns the interval resulting of the union of two CATMathIntervals.

class.name: CATMathIntervalND
class.abstract: Class representing a closed bounded interval of <tt>R^N</tt>.

constructor.name: CATMathIntervalND
constructor.abstract: Constructs a CATMathIntervalND of dimension N=0, only containing <tt>0</tt>.

constructor.name: CATMathIntervalND
constructor.abstract: Allocates a CATMathInterval of a given dimension.

constructor.name: CATMathIntervalND
constructor.abstract: Constructs a CATMathIntervalND of a given dimension from the array of the boundaries of each coordinates.

method.name: Center
method.abstract: Returns the center point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND.

method.name: ContainsPoint
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND contains a given point (of dimension N).

method.name: ContainsPoint
method.abstract: Tests whether a point is inside <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND at a given tolerance.

method.name: GetCoords
method.abstract: Returns the limitations of <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND in an array.

method.name: GetDimension
method.abstract: Returns the dimension of <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND.

method.name: GetInterval
method.abstract: Returns the CATMathInterval associated with a coordinate of <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND.

method.name: GetMax
method.abstract: Returns the high limitation of a coordinate of <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND.

method.name: GetMin
method.abstract: Returns the low limitation of a coordinate of <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND.

method.name: Intersection
method.abstract: Intersects <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND with a segment.

method.name: IsEmpty
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND is empty.

method.name: MinSquareDistance
method.abstract: Projects a given point onto <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND.

method.name: SetCoords
method.abstract: Sets the limitations of <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND with an array.

method.name: SetInterval
method.abstract: Modifies the limitations associated with a coordinate of <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND.

method.name: SetMax
method.abstract: Modifies the high limitation of a coordinate of <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND.

method.name: SetMin
method.abstract: Modifies the low limitation of a coordinate of <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND.

method.name: Width
method.abstract: Returns the sum of the interval width of each coordinate of <tt>this</tt> CATMathIntervalND.

method.name: operator =
method.abstract: Assignement operator.

class.name: CATMathPolynomX
class.abstract: Class defining the real polynom of one variable.

constructor.name: CATMathPolynomX
constructor.abstract: Constructs a polynom of one variable.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX from values defined by an interval.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Simultaneously evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX and its derivatives.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Simultaneously evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX and its derivatives at regularly spaced values.

method.name: EvalFirstDeriv
method.abstract: Evaluates the first derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX.

method.name: EvalFirstDeriv
method.abstract: Evaluates the first derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX from values defined by an interval.

method.name: EvalSecondDeriv
method.abstract: Evaluates the second derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX.

method.name: EvalSecondDeriv
method.abstract: Evaluates the second derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX from values defined by an interval.

method.name: EvalThirdDeriv
method.abstract: Evaluates the third derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX.

method.name: EvalThirdDeriv
method.abstract: Evaluates the third derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX from values defined by an interval.

method.name: GetCoefficients
method.abstract: Retrieves the coefficients of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX.

method.name: GetCoefficients
method.abstract: Returns the coefficients of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX.

method.name: GetDegree
method.abstract: Returns the degree of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX.

method.name: IsA
method.abstract: Returns the class name of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX.

method.name: IsAKindOf
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX derives from a class (given by its name).

method.name: IsATypeOf
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX derives from a class (given by a numerical value).

method.name: IsOption
method.abstract: Tests whether an evaluator is available for <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX.

method.name: SetCoefficients
method.abstract: Modifies the coeficients of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomX.

class.name: CATMathPolynomXY
class.abstract: Class defining the real polynom of two variables.

constructor.name: CATMathPolynomXY
constructor.abstract: Constructs a CATMathPolynomXY from an array.

constructor.name: CATMathPolynomXY
constructor.abstract: Constructs a CATMathPolynomXY from a double entry array.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Simultaneously evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY or/and its partial derivatives.

method.name: Eval
method.abstract: Simultaneously evaluates <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY or/and its partial derivatives on a regular grid of points.

method.name: EvalAllThirdDerivs
method.abstract: Evaluates simultaneously all third partial derivatives of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY .

method.name: EvalFirstDerivX
method.abstract: Evaluates the first partial derivative with respect to the first variable of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY .

method.name: EvalFirstDerivY
method.abstract: Evaluates the first partial derivative with respect to the second variable of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY .

method.name: EvalSecondDerivX2
method.abstract: Evaluates the second partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY .

method.name: EvalSecondDerivXY
method.abstract: Evaluates the second partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY .

method.name: EvalSecondDerivY2
method.abstract: Evaluates the second partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY .

method.name: EvalThirdDerivX2Y
method.abstract: Evaluates the third partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY .

method.name: EvalThirdDerivX3
method.abstract: Evaluates the third partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY .

method.name: EvalThirdDerivXY2
method.abstract: Evaluates the third partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY .

method.name: EvalThirdDerivY3
method.abstract: Evaluates the third partial derivative of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY .

method.name: EvalUpToThirdDeriv
method.abstract: Evaluates simultaneously the value, and all the first, second and third partial derivatives of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY .

method.name: GetCoefficients
method.abstract: Returns the coefficients of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY.

method.name: GetDegreeX
method.abstract: Up to V5R20, returns the degree in the first variable.

method.name: GetDegreeX
method.abstract: From V5R21, returns the degree in the first variable.

method.name: GetDegreeY
method.abstract: Up to V5R20, returns the degree in the second variable.

method.name: GetDegreeY
method.abstract: From V5R21, returns the degree in the second variable.

method.name: IsA
method.abstract: Returns the class name of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY.

method.name: IsAKindOf
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY derives from a class (given by its name).

method.name: IsATypeOf
method.abstract: Tests if <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY derives from a class (given by a numerical value).

method.name: IsOption
method.abstract: Tests whether an evaluator is available for <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY.

method.name: SetCoefficients
method.abstract: Modifies the coefficients of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY.

method.name: SetCoefficients
method.abstract: Modifies the coefficients of <tt>this</tt> CATMathPolynomXY.

class.name: CATMathSetOfPointsND
class.abstract: Class defining a set of points in <tt>R^n</tt>.

method.name: AddNewPoint
method.abstract: Appends a point at the end of the set if it is different from the last point.

method.name: AddPoint
method.abstract: Appends a point at the end of the set.

method.name: AddSet
method.abstract: Concatenates a CATMathSetOfPointsND just after the last point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: AutoInvert
method.abstract: Inverts the content of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND inside itself.

method.name: Beginning
method.abstract: Resets the iterator to read the points again.

method.name: BoundingBox
method.abstract: Builds the marginless bounding box.

method.name: ComputeTangents
method.abstract: Computes the tangent in each point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: ConvexContour
method.abstract: Builds the convex contour of a given two-dimensional set.

method.name: DistanceMin
method.abstract: Retrieves the closest point of the polyline in RN defined by <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND to a given point.

method.name: FindCircle
method.abstract: Searches for a 3D circle defined by the set of points on 3 specific coordinates.

method.name: FindConic
method.abstract: Searches for a conics defined by the set of points on 2 specific coordinates.

method.name: FindConic
method.abstract: From V5R17, searches for a conics defined by the set of points on 2 specific coordinates.

method.name: FindConicParameters
method.abstract: From V5R17 onwards, retrieves the conics parameters from its equation parameters.

method.name: GetClosestPoints
method.abstract: Retrieves the two points of the polyline in RN defined by <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND which are the closest to a given point.

method.name: GetCurrentIndex
method.abstract: Returns the index of the iterator inside <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: GetDimension
method.abstract: Returns the dimension of the space in which the points are defined.

method.name: GetFirstPointOnSegment
method.abstract: Intersects <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND and a segment in RN.

method.name: GetMaxNumberOfPoints
method.abstract: Returns the maximum number of points of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: GetNumberOfPoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of points of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND that are already set.

method.name: GetPoint
method.abstract: Retrieves the array of the coordinates of the current point.

method.name: GetPoint
method.abstract: Retrieves the coordinates of a specific point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: GetPoints
method.abstract: Returns the array of the coordinates of the all the points.

method.name: InitializeParameters
method.abstract: Computes the distance between two successive points of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: InsertPoint
method.abstract: Inserts a point at a specific position.

method.name: Invert
method.abstract: Inverts the content of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: IsAKindOf
method.abstract: Tests the class of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: IsContaining
method.abstract: Tests if a point is on the polyline defined by <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: IsIncludedIn
method.abstract: Tests if a point is equal to a point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: IsLinear
method.abstract: Searches for a line defined by the set of points on specific coordinates.

method.name: IsMonotonousAlong
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND is monotonous with regards to one of its coordinates.

method.name: IsPeriodic
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND is periodic.

method.name: Length
method.abstract: Returns the length of the polyline in RN defined by the set of points.

method.name: Next
method.abstract: Skips to the next point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: Pack
method.abstract: Packs <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPoints.

method.name: RemoveMultiplePoints
method.abstract: Removes the duplicated points of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: RemovePoint
method.abstract: Removes one point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: RemovePoints
method.abstract: Removes points of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: ReplacePoint
method.abstract: Replaces the coordinates of the current point.

method.name: ReplacePoint
method.abstract: Replaces the coordinates of a specific point.

method.name: ReplacePoints
method.abstract: Sets the coordinates of all the points.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPoints.

method.name: Resize
method.abstract: Resizes <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPoints.

method.name: SetCoordAtPoint
method.abstract: Sets the value of a coordinate of a point.

method.name: SetPeriodic
method.abstract: Sets the periodicity of <tt>this</tt > CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: Simplify
method.abstract: Simpifies <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: Sort
method.abstract: Sorts <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND along coordinate index, from the smallest to the highest coordinate.

method.name: Split
method.abstract: Splits a CATMathSetOfPointsND just after the point corresponding to the iIndex.

method.name: SwapPoints
method.abstract: Swaps two points inside <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: operator =
method.abstract: Assignment operator.

enum.name: ConicType
enum.abstract: The type of mathematical configurations of a set of points.

class.name: CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents
class.abstract: Class defining a set of points in <tt>R^n</tt> with two extremal tangents.

method.name: AddSet
method.abstract: Concatenates a CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents just after the last point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents.

method.name: AutoInvert
method.abstract: Inverts the content of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents inside itself.

method.name: ComputeTangents
method.abstract: Computes the tangent in each point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsND.

method.name: FindCircle
method.abstract: Searches for a 3D circle defined by the set of points on 3 specific coordinates.

method.name: GetFirstTangent
method.abstract: Returns the first tangent of <tt>this</tt > CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents.

method.name: GetLastTangent
method.abstract: Returns the last tangent of <tt>this</tt > CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents.

method.name: Invert
method.abstract: Inverts the content of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents.

method.name: IsA
method.abstract: Returns the class name .

method.name: IsAKindOf
method.abstract: Tests the class of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents.

method.name: IsLinear
method.abstract: Searches for a line defined by the set of points on specific coordinates.

method.name: RemovePoint
method.abstract: Removes one point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents.

method.name: RemovePoints
method.abstract: Removes points of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsTwoTangents (the points and the tangents).

method.name: SetFirstTangent
method.abstract: Modifies the first tangent of <tt>this</tt > CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents.

method.name: SetLastTangent
method.abstract: Modifies the last tangent of <tt>this</tt > CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents.

method.name: SetPeriodic
method.abstract: Sets the periodicity of <tt>this</tt > CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents.

method.name: Split
method.abstract: Splits a CATMathSetOfPointsNDTwoTangents just after the point corresponding to the iIndex.

method.name: operator =
method.abstract: Assignment operator.

class.name: CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors
class.abstract: Class defining a set of points in <tt>R^n</tt> with associated vectors.

method.name: AddNewPointWithVector
method.abstract: Appends a point and its associated vector at the end of the set, if the point is different from the last one.

method.name: AddPoint
method.abstract: Appends a point at the end of the set.

method.name: AddPointWithVector
method.abstract: Appends a point and its associated vector at the end of the set.

method.name: AddSet
method.abstract: Concatenates a CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors just after the last point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors.

method.name: AutoInvert
method.abstract: Inverts the content of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors inside itself.

method.name: FindCircle
method.abstract: Searches for a 3D circle defined by the set of points on 3 specific coordinates.

method.name: GetLastTangent
method.abstract: Returns the last tangent of <tt>this</tt > CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors.

method.name: GetPointWithVector
method.abstract: Retrieves the coordinates of a specific point and its associated vector .

method.name: GetVector
method.abstract: Retrieves the coordinates of the vector associated with the current point.

method.name: GetVector
method.abstract: Retrieves the vector associated with a specific point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVector.

method.name: GetVectors
method.abstract: Returns the coordinates of the vector associated with the current point.

method.name: InitializeParameters
method.abstract: Computes the distance between two successive points of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors.

method.name: InsertPoint
method.abstract: Inserts a point at a specific position.

method.name: InsertPointWithVector
method.abstract: Inserts a point and its associated vector at a specific position.

method.name: Invert
method.abstract: Inverts the content of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors.

method.name: IsA
method.abstract: Returns the class name .

method.name: IsAKindOf
method.abstract: Tests the class of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors.

method.name: IsLinear
method.abstract: Searches for a line defined by the set of points on specific coordinates.

method.name: Pack
method.abstract: Packs <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsWithVectors.

method.name: RemovePoint
method.abstract: Removes one point of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors.

method.name: RemovePoints
method.abstract: Removes points of <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors.

method.name: ReplaceVector
method.abstract: Replaces the coordinates of vector associated with the current point.

method.name: ReplaceVector
method.abstract: Replaces the coordinates of the vector associated with a specific point.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsTwoTangents (the points, the vectors and tangents).

method.name: SetLastTangent
method.abstract: Modifies the last tangent of <tt>this</tt > CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors.

method.name: SetPeriodic
method.abstract: Sets the periodicity of <tt>this</tt > CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors.

method.name: Split
method.abstract: Splits a CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors just after the point corresponding to the iIndex.

method.name: SwapPoints
method.abstract: Swaps two points inside <tt>this</tt> CATMathSetOfPointsNDWithVectors.

method.name: operator =
method.abstract: Assignment operator.

define.name: CATMathFunctionXTypeId
define.abstract: The type of mathematical function of one variable.

define.name: CATMathFunctionXYTypeId
define.abstract: The type of mathematical function of two variables.

function.name: CATProjectPointOnSegmentND
function.abstract: Projects a point on a segment in a N dimensional space.

function.name: CATScalarProductND
function.abstract: Computes the scalar product of two N dimensional vectors.

function.name: CATSquareDistanceND
function.abstract: Returns the square distance between two N dimensional points.
